Careers at Miso

City Operations Manager (도시운영팀장)

The City Operations Manager is a unique opportunity to help drive growth through the optimization of our growing number of independent cleaners. This is a critical role which requires operational excellence and directly correlates to continually improving the customer experience through greater cleaner availability while minimizing costs.

This is an intense business side startup role and continual improvement and a focus on quality are imperative. This data driven role calls for a rare combination of analytical thinking, empathy to manage cleaner relationships and to be the owner of operational performance of your city. You will be required to utilize and build tools that monitor cleaner behavior and ensure efficiency through asset utilization, network optimization and cleaner supply growth.

What you will do

  • Take ownership of Miso’s growth in your city
  • Be on the front lines for cleaner on boarding and training
  • Manage deployment and quality of supply chain (i.e. our cleaner partners)
  • Heavy metrics analysis and product/process improvement
  • Communicate product/process needs, work with product/engineering to deliver on them
  • Help scale our other cities through developing and sharing best practices
  • Define and implement launch of new cleaner facing products

What you need to know

  • Startup (all-hands-on-deck) "I bust my ass because I love it" approach with the ability to get shit done
  • Up to 3 years of operational/analytical experience gained in consulting, investment banking, etc.
  • Strong people management skills, you set the tone for your team
  • Data driven decision making mentality and sound business judgment through strong analytical thinking

Benefits

  • Equity compensation plan
  • Fantastic opportunity to grow with the team; shape the strategic direction of your city
  • Free cleanings so you can benefit from your work

How to apply: If you’re interested, please email your resume to victor@getmiso.com.
